content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
• Intended Lab for Research Supply at (0.5, 2.5)
  – Purpose: To receive Automation Science Packs for fulfilling research requirements.
  – Note: Multiple attempts were made to craft and place the Lab, but creation failed because the required Lab item was not available in the inventory and its requisite sub-ingredients (such as iron‐gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) were missing.

• Iron Plate Smelting Furnace at (5.0, 5.0)
  – Purpose: Used to process iron ore and coal into additional iron plates.
  – Components: An existing furnace located at (5.0, 5.0) retrieved for iron plate production.

• Copper Plate Smelting Furnace at (–27.0, –60.0)
  – Purpose: Used to convert harvested copper ore and coal into copper plates.
  – Components: An existing copper furnace located at (–27.0, –60.0) retrieved for copper plate production.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Consistency
  – When invoking get_entities, use the correct parameters as specified. Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (e.g., “radius”) or providing an incorrect number of positional arguments.

• Entity Retrieval and Iteration
  – Validate that the result of entity retrieval (e.g., existing_labs) is not None before attempting to iterate over it. Use a safe fallback (such as an empty list) to prevent NoneType errors.

• Lab Placement and Crafting
  – Check that the required Lab item is available in the inventory before attempting placement.
  – Ensure that all prerequisite resources and sub-ingredients (iron‐gear-wheels, electronic circuits, copper cables, and their component copper plates) are sufficiently available and that the associated production chain is fully operational before initiating Lab crafting.

NAMESPACE
─────────
(No agent-defined utility functions were identified.)
